name: IDES-Data-Preparation-Dot-Java
description: The International Data Exchange Service (IDES) is a secure managed file transfer service that allows financial institutions and tax authorities to securely send information on financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers in accordance with the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (FATCA). The IDES Data Preparation JAVA project repository demonstrates a sample working application developed using .NET.
